name: Stroke Prediction Dataset
data_intro: This dataset is used to predict whether a patient is likely to get stroke based on the input parameters like gender, age, various diseases, and smoking status. Each row in the data provides relavant information about the patient.

num_feature_intro.age: 9) avg\_glucose\_level: average glucose level in blood
num_feature_intro.hypertension: 4) hypertension: 0 if the patient doesn't have hypertension, 1 if the patient has hypertension
num_feature_intro.stroke: 12) stroke: 1 if the patient had a stroke or 0 if not
